params.amountA: Initial amount of tokenA to mint and add as liquidity.
params.amountB: Initial amount of tokenB to mint and add as liquidity.
params.amountIn: Amount of tokenA to swap for tokenB.
params.author: Name of the author of swap contract
params.swapContract: Address of the SimpleSwap contract to verify.
params.tokenA: Address of a test ERC20 token (must implement IMintableERC20).
params.tokenB: Address of a test ERC20 token (must implement IMintableERC20).

verify(address,address,address,uint256,u.notice: Runs end-to-end checks on a deployed SimpleSwap contract.

userdoc.notice: Verifies a SimpleSwap implementation by exercising its functions and asserting correct behavior.
